manifest.name: parse-imports-exports
manifest.description: Fast and easy parser for declarations of import and export in ECMAScript/TypeScript

scripts.prerelease: npm test && cp LICENSE package.json README.md ./build/src && rm ./build/src/types.cjs ./build/src/types.js
scripts.test: export _START=$(date +%s%3N) && npm run prettier && npm run build && node ./build/spec/index.spec.js
